definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Before the economic reforms, Beijing's largest department store was the Wangfujing Hundred Goods Emporium.
sentences.chinese: 改革開放以前，北京最大的商店就是王府井百貨大樓。

sentences.english: I will be working in the department store next month.
sentences.chinese: 下個月我將在這個百貨大樓裏上班。

sentences.english: Keep going until you come to a department store. You can't miss it.
sentences.chinese: 往前一直走到百貨大樓，你不會找不到的。

sentences.english: Advertisement papers were sent around the department papers were sent around the department store.
sentences.chinese: 在百貨大樓周圍散發了廣告傳單。

sentences.english: Could you accompany me to the department store some time this week?
sentences.chinese: 您本週什麼時間有空能陪我去百貨大樓一趟嗎？

definition: Shenyang subprovincial city and capital of Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/old names include Fengtian 奉天, Shengjing 盛京 and Mukden
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Cangshan district of Fuzhou city 福州市[Fu2 zhou1 shi4], Fujian
Dexing county level city in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
(bird species of China) tundra swan (Cygnus columbianus)
Xinshi District of Ürümqi, Xinjiang/Sinshih District of Tainan, Taiwan
the Shanghai of old, with its foreign settlements/(fig.) a bustling, cosmopolitan city
